q.en: How do I pay the rent?

a.en: The rent can be paid by check or cash in US dollars. If you wish to make a payment by credit card or pay in RMB via bank transfer or Alipay, an additional 5% service fee will apply.
a.zh: 租金可以透過支票或美元現金支付。如果您希望透過信用卡付款或透過銀行轉帳或支付寶以人民幣付款，將收取額外5%的服務費。

q.en: When do I pay the rent?

a.en: The deposit and 1st month rent will be paid upon the first arrival at the dormitory. The rent for the following month must be paid before the same date next month; otherwise, the access card will be disabled, and you will not be able to enter your room.
a.zh: 押金和第一個月的租金將在第一次抵達宿舍時支付。下個月的租金必須在下個月的同一日期之前支付；否則，門禁卡將被停用，您將無法進入房間。

q.en: What should I prepare for moving in?

a.en: Please bring your personal daily essentials, including a pillow, blanket, sheets, toiletries, and more.
a.zh: 請攜帶您的個人日常必需品，包括枕頭、毛毯、床單、盥洗用品等。

q.en: If I no longer need airport pick-up or my travel plans change, what should I do?
q.zh: 如果我不再需要機場接送或我的旅行計畫發生變化，我該怎麼辦？

a.en: Please contact STAC as soon as possible to inform them of the changes. If you forget to reach out, it may result in thecancellation of your accommodation, and all fees and deposits will be non-refundable.
a.zh: 請盡快聯絡 STAC 以告知其變更。如果您忘記聯繫，可能會導致您的住宿被取消，並且所有費用和押金將不予退還。

q.en: Why do I need to purchase medical insurance before arriving at STAC dorm?
q.zh: 為什麼我在到達STAC宿舍之前需要購買醫療保險？

a.en: Medical insurance is required to ensure you have access to necessary healthcare services during your stay. You must obtain medical insurance or travel insurance to cover you during the airport pick-up and the period before you purchase your education provider's designated health insurance at your school.
a.zh: 需要醫療保險以確保您在住宿期間能夠獲得必要的醫療保健服務。您必須購買醫療保險或旅遊保險，以便在機場接機期間以及在學校購買教育機構指定的健康保險之前為您提供保障。

q.en: Why do I need to purchase renter's insurance during my stay?
q.zh: 為什麼我住宿期間需要購買房客保險？

a.en: Renter's insurance is important because it protects your personal  belongings in case of theft, damage, or loss due to events like fire  or flooding. It also provides liability coverage, which can protect  you if someone is injured in your rented space.
a.zh: 承租人的保險很重要，因為它可以保護您的個人物品，以防因火災或洪水等事件而被盜、損壞或遺失。它還提供責任保險，如果有人在您租用的空間中受傷，它可以為您提供保護。

q.en: What should I do if I want to move out or renew my lease when it ends?
q.zh: 如果我想在租約結束時搬出或續簽，我該怎麼辦？

a.en: Please notify STAC of your decision (to renew or move out) at least  30 days before your lease ends. Kindly provide this information in  writing or via email for clarity. Failure to notify us of your  intent to move out will result in a charge for a 30-day rent  extension. Failure to notify us of your intent to renew may result  in the unavailability of your room.
a.zh: 請在租約結束前至少 30 天通知 STAC 您的決定（續約或搬出）。為了清楚起見，請以書面或電子郵件提供此資訊。未能通知我們您的搬出意圖將導致收取 30 天延期租金的費用。如果未能通知我們您的續訂意圖，可能會導致您的房間無法使用。

q.en: What should I do if my lease cannot be renewed due to the  unavailability of the room and other reasons?
q.zh: 如果因為房間不足等原因無法續租怎麼辦？

a.en: Please start looking for new housing options as soon as possible to  find a suitable place. If you stay beyond the lease term, please  check with STAC for the daily rate for your room. If you need STAC  to assist you in finding a room in the local area, a service fee of  $750 will apply.
a.zh: 請盡快開始尋找新的住房選擇，以找到合適的地方。如果您的住宿超過租賃期限，請向 STAC 查詢您房間的每日房價。如果您需要STAC協助您在當地尋找房間，則需支付750美元的服務費。

q.en: How far is the STAC dorm from De Anza College?
q.zh: STAC 宿舍離 De Anza College 有多遠？

a.en: The distance from STAC dorm to De Anza College is approximately 5  miles. It usually takes about 10-15 minutes by car and around 30  minutes by bus.
a.zh: 從 STAC 宿舍到 De Anza 學院的距離約為 5 英里。通常開車約 10-15 分鐘，搭乘巴士約30分鐘。

q.en: What documents do I need to open a local bank account in the U.S.?
q.zh: 在美國開設本地銀行帳戶需要什麼文件？

a.en: Passport, A photo ID (such as a driver's license or student ID),Email address, local Phone number.
a.zh: 護照、附照片的身份證件（例如駕照或學生證）、電子郵件地址、本地電話號碼。

q.en: How should I handle my meals?
q.zh: 我應該如何處理我的膳食？

a.en: The dormitory will provide breakfast every weekday from Monday to  Friday. For dinner, you can either order takeout or cook for  yourself. Here are some examples of what breakfast will include:  juice, toast, milk, eggs, bread, fruit, and more.
a.zh: 宿舍每週一至週五提供早餐。晚餐可以叫外賣，也可以自己煮飯。以下是早餐的一些例子：果汁、吐司、牛奶、雞蛋、麵包、水果等。

q.en: Can my friends or family stay overnight to visit me?
q.zh: 我的朋友或家人可以過夜探望我嗎？

a.en: Students are not permitted to have friends or family stay overnight.  For special circumstances, please contact the STAC staff for  guidance.
a.zh: 學生不得讓朋友或家人過夜。  如有特殊情況，請聯絡STAC工作人員指導。

q.en: Is there internet access in the dormitory?

a.en: Yes, the dormitory has free public Wi-Fi. However, the internet is  primarily for study purposes. The public Wi-Fi is intended for all tenants and should not be used for downloading music, movies, or playing games, as this may jeopardize the service. You are welcome to set up your own internet service to meet your needs.
a.zh: 是的，宿舍有免費公共Wi-Fi。然而，互聯網主要用於學習目的。公共 Wi-Fi 供所有租戶使用，不應用於下載音樂、電影或玩遊戲，因為這可能會危及服務。歡迎您建立自己的網路服務來滿足您的需求。

q.en: What will be in my dorm room?

a.en: All students will have a bed, mattress, desk, chair, wardrobe, and mini fridge. If you have specific requests for your room, you will need to purchase those items yourself. In most cases, students share a bathroom with one other person.
a.zh: 所有學生將擁有床、床墊、書桌、椅子、衣櫃和迷你冰箱。如果您對房間有特殊要求，則需要自行購買這些物品。在大多數情況下，學生與另一個人共用一間浴室。

q.en: Am I allowed to change my room during my stay?
q.zh: 住宿期間我可以更換房間嗎？

a.en: Students may request to change their room once during their stay for valid reasons, but this request may be denied due to occupancy or other factors. A room change requires signing a new lease agreement and covering related costs, such as application fees.
a.zh: 學生在住宿期間可以因正當理由要求更換房間一次，但該請求可能會因入住情況或其他因素而被拒絕。更換房間需要簽署新的租賃協議並支付相關費用，例如申請費。

q.en: What are the house rules for the STAC dormitory? What happens if I violate them?
q.zh: STAC宿舍的入住規則是什麼？如果我違反它們會怎樣？

a.en: The house rules outline the requirements for living in the STAC dormitory. Please read through the lease agreement and house rules carefully. If students violate the lease agreements or STAC’s house rules, they will be notified and asked to correct the violation. If the same or another violation occurs or continues, the resident will receive written notice that further violations may result in eviction.
a.zh: 住宿規則概述了 STAC 宿舍的居住要求。請仔細閱讀租賃協議和房屋規則。如果學生違反租賃協議或 STAC 的住宿規則，他們將收到通知並要求糾正違規行為。如果發生或繼續發生相同或其他違規行為，居民將收到書面通知，表明進一步的違規行為可能會導致被驅逐。

q.en: What could cause my lease to be terminated?
q.zh: 什麼會導致我的租約被終止？

a.en: If students violate lease agreements, STAC’s house rules, fail to comply with management requirements, or are disrespectful to STAC management staff, it may lead to termination of the lease. This includes behaviors such as theft, harassment, difficulties in getting along with other international students, violent behavior, underage drinking for students under 21, lying or committing fraud, and engaging in any illegal activities. Such actions may result in eviction without any refund.
a.zh: 如果學生違反租賃協議、STAC 的宿舍規則、不遵守管理要求或不尊重 STAC 管理人員，可能會導致租約終止。這包括盜竊、騷擾、與其他國際學生相處困難、暴力行為、21 歲以下學生未成年飲酒、撒謊或欺詐以及從事任何非法活動等行為。此類行為可能會導致驅逐且不予退款。

q.en: In case of an emergency, who should I contact?
q.zh: 如果發生緊急情況，我該聯絡誰？

a.en: In an emergency, you should call 911 and also contact STAC staff at the same time.
a.zh: 遇到緊急情況，您應該撥打911，同時聯絡STAC工作人員。
